name: BIZ MAN in BIZ LAND
description:
The stock market is crashing! Help MR. BIZ hold on to his $BIG DOLLAR by selling and buying stocks! Just kidding, you just drag colored things around, really.

Get $BIG DOLLAR  and TIME by dragging or lining up the plummeting STOCKS to their corresponding base color. Messing up will reduce both your time AND money. Unbelievable. Now HURRY, time is running out!
